name: Block Puzzle Wood Blast
description:
Simple easy to play but challenging to master Block Puzzle Wood Blast. As a calm and addictive strategy game, it improves your logic skills and refreshes your mind. The lucky star chest will help you break your highest score.

Better Choice, Better Relaxation:
- Comfortable wooden style is closer to nature, to enjoy a Zen moment.
- Simple UI plus brisk sound effect.
- Best companion without any internet/time/place limitation.
- Mental exercise game, suitable for all ages.
- Compete with worldwide players, rocket up the leaderboard.

Tips For Beginners:
- Drag and drop wooden blocks into the 10×10 grid.
- Eliminate blocks by creating full rows and columns.
- Smash as multiple blocks at once as possible.
- Don't forget to use powerful props.
- No space to stack blocks, the game over.

Take a break with this cute puzzle game, and you'll be hooked!
